questions.text: Is there a documented compliance program aligned with NCDEX requirements?
questions.help_text: Program should address all NCDEX regulatory requirements.

questions.text: Is a compliance officer designated for NCDEX matters?
questions.help_text: Officer should have adequate authority and resources.

questions.text: Are trading systems protected against unauthorized access?
questions.help_text: Access controls should include role-based permissions and MFA.

questions.text: Is trading activity monitored and logged in real-time?
questions.help_text: Logs should be retained for audit purposes as per regulations.

questions.text: Are operational risks identified and documented?
questions.help_text: Documentation should include risk mitigation strategies.

questions.text: Is there a Business Continuity Plan specific to trading operations?
questions.help_text: Plan should ensure minimal disruption to trading activities.

questions.text: Is customer data protected in accordance with privacy regulations?
questions.help_text: Protection includes encryption and access controls.

questions.text: Are data retention policies aligned with regulatory requirements?
questions.help_text: Retention periods should comply with NCDEX guidelines.

questions.text: Are internal audits conducted at least quarterly?
questions.help_text: Audits should cover all critical systems and processes.

questions.text: Are audit findings reported to management and NCDEX as required?
questions.help_text: Reporting should be timely and comprehensive.
